mapper.select: SELECT articleNum, articleTitle, articleContent, articleAuthor, memberName, articleDate, articleLike FROM articles A INNER JOIN members M ON A.articleAuthor = M.memberId

SELECT articleNum, articleTitle, articleContent, articleAuthor, memberName, articleDate, articleLike FROM articles A INNER JOIN members M ON A.articleAuthor = M.memberId WHERE articleNum = #{articleNum}
SELECT commentNum, commentContent, commentAuthor, memberName, commentDate, commentArticle FROM comments C INNER JOIN members M on C.commentAuthor = M.memberId WHERE commentArticle = #{articleNum}
SELECT commentNum, commentContent, commentAuthor, memberName, commentDate, commentArticle FROM comments C INNER JOIN members M on C.commentAuthor = M.memberId WHERE commentNum = #{commentNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO articles(articleTitle, articleAuthor, articleContent, articleLike) VALUES(#{articleTitle}, #{articleAuthor}, #{articleContent}, 0);
INSERT INTO comments(commentContent, commentAuthor, commentArticle) VALUES(#{commentContent}, #{commentAuthor}, #{commentArticle});
